title: Watch All The Apple TV Aerial Video Screensavers
text:
Watch All The Apple TV Aerial Video Screensavers 
WebDesignerNews Sunday 25th October, 2015 
The new Apple TV includes several choices of screensaver, including Aerial, an exclusive set of slow-moving HD video of various landmarks and places in the world. Whatâ€™s most interesting is that the displayed video actually changes over time, as the Apple TV downloads new videos periodically from an online location.
